website_summaries.verdict: Professional grade shoes for those who are on their feet a lot.
pros: Good support and cushioning with super comfortable flexible soles
Soles are treaded and offer great traction
Utilitarian style, but not too "senior citizen"
Good fit that fits well on the width without having to size up or down
cons: These are matte leather, which won’t take a shine which disappointed some users

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these 3 months. so far, So comfortable. I wanted to wait to review. I walk average 8 miles a day at work on concrete. My feet don't hurt at the end of the day. I would by again. Great product and MADE in the USA!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: OLD!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I purchased this new, but it was definitely newly used! I took the tag off and wore it but then I didn't realize there was some green pen stain on the sleeve til later.
customer_reviews.author: jdang813

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable wow!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They seem a bit slippery for slip resistant but I work in fast food business so the floor is extra greasy. they are probably perfect for any other biz. They are so comfortable and I love them so much i will order an all tra pair.
customer_reviews.author: kristina hill

customer_reviews.title: and I loved the fact that the shoes were made in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because they did not fit. Even though they were listed as wide, it still fit too tight on my feet. Length was okay, but width was not correct. It was a very well made shoe, and I loved the fact that the shoes were made in the USA. I just couldn't keep these because of the tightness on the width.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: strange fit
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work and was disappointed. The leather will not take polish at all and is not acceptable for the uniform I wear. The fit was strange. While the shoe is the correct size the insole was too narrow, the edge of it ran under the center of the ball of my foot. I looked at changing out the insole but the foot bed is narrow while the toe box area is wider. I usually wear a medium width. I am sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: P E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace older Thorogood work shoes that I had been wearing for some time. I found them on Amazon for a much better price than I could find them anywhere even on their website. They are very comfortable and break in very easily. Note, if you wear ortho supports buy a wide size to ensure proper fit. When it's time to replace these ones I'll be coming back to Amazon and Thorogood.
customer_reviews.author: C. McYoung

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: The tongue on these shoes digs into my ankle. Not as comfortable as I would like. Hoping with breaking in, the tongue won't dig in anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: feels like you have pillows on
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet sometimes up to 16 hours and have had trouble finding shoes. Most work shoes or boots feel like your dragging weights, too hot and after awhile your just feel like your dragging yourself around. These boots are great I was able to get a wide size without having to go a size up or down.
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product for a work environment but it is too ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for a work environment but it is too small for me and I hope to return this for credit.
customer_reviews.author: toto

customer_reviews.title: beware of return policy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy and too small....had to pay $20 just to return..
customer_reviews.author: Joy w

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of shoe, I have bought another pair that was lighter these are a tad bit heavier and not as cushy in the tongue area which can cause discomfort if tied to tightly ... That said these shoes are worth the money as they last a long time and I work in a hospital setting so I am on feet for long periods of time, I believe I had my last pair for at least 3 years can't beat that
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M. Bolos

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but when I put my much needed inserts in they flop and have anout an inch gap . I needed wide width and they are wide enough, but if I want to wear my inserts I will have to return them for 1/2 size smaller, otherwise they are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome. They are comfortable and don’t hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. They are comfortable and don’t hurt my feet. I walk all day delivering mail so this is important.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable on cement all morning. I love that they are made in USA and that is what sealed the deal for me. I regret not getting the more expensive model with more ankle support, but these are good!
customer_reviews.author: cjc

customer_reviews.title: Best looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Very well made and great quality. I will be buying a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ghobrial

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I am a nurse and wear them for work. My feet feel much better after long days than when I wear comfortable sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe, but I had to order a half size bigger to fit my usual size 9
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable ever for one whose job requires a lot of time on one's feet. They are worth the price and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: R Blow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! My feet feel so comfortable on them
customer_reviews.author: evelyn marmolejo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my forth pair and they never fail to live up to expectation. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize these were work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, and look okay with jeans, but I did not realize they were the non-skid, grease resistant work shoes that people in food service wear. They have that look to them, and are not as fashionable as I thought they looked in the picture. If I had realized they were work shoes I would not have bought them. I was looking for comfortable fashion footwear.
customer_reviews.author: terryje

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good supportable shoe. Very nice seller Very durable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Emanuel

product_meta.title: Thorogood Women's Soft Streets Series Plain Toe Oxford
